Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-SWITCH-KEY.request primitive.

See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.26, page 468.

Definition at line 73 of file apsmeSwitchKey.h.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_SwitchKeyReq_t::destAddress

[LE] The extended 64-bit address of the device to which the switch-key command is sent.

Definition at line 85 of file apsmeSwitchKey.h.

uint8_t APS_SwitchKeyReq_t::keySeqNumber

A sequence number assigned to a network key by the Trust Center and used to distinguish network keys.

Definition at line 88 of file apsmeSwitchKey.h.

APS_SwitchKeyConf_t APS_SwitchKeyReq_t::confirm

Confirm primitive as a parameter of the callback function

Definition at line 90 of file apsmeSwitchKey.h.

void(* APS_SwitchKeyReq_t::APS_SwitchKeyConf)(APS_SwitchKeyConf_t *conf)

Callback function pointer as a handler of corresponding confirm primitive. Must not be set to NULL.
